channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Spritzes and Carbonaras That Ate Italy
item.description: Tourism has turned some Italian streets into monochromatic eating zones. Some officials have banned the opening of new restaurants.

item.title: Trump commutes sentence of former Rep. George Santos, who was serving 7 years for fraud and identity theft
item.description: “George Santos was somewhat of a ‘rogue,’ but there are many rogues throughout our Country that aren’t forced to serve seven years in prison."

item.title: The Indonesian Free-Food Program That Has Sickened Thousands

item.title: Wikipedia Volunteers Avert Tragedy by Taking Down Gunman at Conference

item.title: U.S. Detains 2 Survivors of Latest Military Strike in Caribbean
item.description: The capture of prisoners presents a major new set of legal and policy problems for the Trump administration in its escalating campaign.

item.title: George Santos Is Released From Prison, His Lawyer Says, After Trump Commutes His Sentence
item.description: George Santos’s lawyer said the disgraced former congressman was freed from a New Jersey prison around 10 p.m. on Friday. He served less than three mo...

item.title: 10 Injured in Balcony Collapse in Cincinnati
item.description: People gathered at a house near the University of Cincinnati tumbled to the ground from a third-floor balcony, the fire department said. One person wa...

item.title: U.S. auto delinquencies have jumped 50% from 15 years ago
item.description: “Consumers now are in a more precarious position than they’ve been since the last recession,” said Rikard Bandebo, VantageScore’s chief economist.

item.title: Rattled Wall Street on alert after trillion-dollar risk runup
item.description: Stocks still ended the week with a tidy gain, but six days of volatility across assets shows a deeper anxiety taking hold: credit fragility.

item.title: Wealthy millennial, Gen Z Platinum members drive American Express to record revenue: ‘very comfortable paying for its exceptional value’

item.title: OpenAI pauses AI-generated deepfakes of Martin Luther King Jr. on Sora 2 app after ‘disrespectful’ depictions
item.description: “For me, many of the AI depictions never rose to the level of free speech,” Bernice A. King wrote on X. “They were foolishness.”
